title: Obama Taps Former Procter & Gamble Chief To Helm VA
teaser: President Obama has picked Robert McDonald, the former CEO of Procter & Gamble, to lead the Department of Veterans Affairs. If confirmed by the Senate, McDonald will face a difficult task. The VA is is embroiled in a controversy over falsified and lengthy wait times for veterans.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
